column4: question -- is there anyway i can make a new /etc/network/interface file?

does anyone have a clean /etc/network/interfaces file?

i havent been able to even connect to my network using them
though i could be doing something wrong
maybe you need updated firmwares. And what about ndiswrapper?

I wouldn't follow so closely the Ralink site. I have more confidence in Ubuntu guides in the wiki pages or ubuntuforums.org information.
